SCHEMA="<insert schema name here>."
PREFIX="<insert your prefix here>_"
props = {}
props['user'] = '<insert user name here>'
props['password'] = '<insert password here>'
jdbcurl='jdbc:db2://<insert dashDb host server here>:50000/BLUDB'
#get the data frame
df = sqlContext.read.jdbc(jdbcurl, SCHEMA + PREFIX+'<insert table here>', properties=props)
df.printSchema()
